description: A hearty yet juicy meatloaf recipe served with an array of seasonal veggies makes this dish a weeknight winner for everyone.
keywords: Beef dishes,Holidays & entertaining,Fresh ingredients,Winter,Pumpkin,Beef,Zucchini,Quick & easy dinner,Parsnip,Sweet potato,Mince,Asparagus
name: Meatloaf for One Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup sweet potato, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the meatloaf ingredients all together and put in baking paper with a quarter of a cup of water to keep it moist and cook in preheated oven for 15-18 minutes on 190C or until 75C.
Meanwhile Steam the veggies, put the carrots, pumpkin and sweet potato and parsnips onto cook first. When nearly done add the greens, don't overcook.
Slice the meatloaf in thin slices and plat up in bowl over the veggies, sprinkle with chopped dill, chilli flakes and drizzle with balsamic vinegar and season before serving.
